message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this remarkable item at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exceptional deal considering its true worth of $1,000,000 to you. We are confident that you will find this offer irresistible. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed, please let us know promptly.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you recognizing the value of the product for me.  However, I'm aiming to stay within a budget of $1,000,000.  Would you be willing to consider a price of $900,000?  I believe this would be a fair price for both of us, and would allow us to finalize the deal quickly.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your budgetary considerations and am pleased to offer a more flexible pricing option. In light of this, I propose a revised price of $925,000 for the product. This still represents a significant discount from its true value of $1,000,000 to you, while allowing us to meet somewhere closer to your budget. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're looking for. Should you have any further inquiries or wish to proceed with this offer, please let me know.
